name: Bernadine Conway POWELL, Appellee, v. Cyril F. CONWAY, Appellant

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, jj.
McDERMOTT, J., did not participate in the decision of this case.
parties: Bernadine Conway POWELL, Appellee, v. Cyril F. CONWAY, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order of Superior Court reversed. See Blue v. Blue, 532 Pa. 521, 616 A.2d 628 (1992).
McDERMOTT, J., did not participate in the decision of this case.
LARSEN, J., dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Richard H. Roesgen, Williamsport, for appellant.
James D. Casale, Williamsport, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
625 A.2d 641
Bernadine Conway POWELL, Appellee, v. Cyril F. CONWAY, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued May 9, 1991.
Decided June 1, 1993.
Richard H. Roesgen, Williamsport, for appellant.
James D. Casale, Williamsport, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, jj.
